scripts.generate: yarn clear:temp && yarn clear:src && mkdir temp && yarn generate:docker && yarn generate:move && yarn generate:fix
scripts.generate:docker: cross-env-shell docker run --rm -v "$INIT_CWD/swagger.v1.json:/etc/spec.json" -v "$INIT_CWD/swagger-codegen-typescript.json:/etc/conf.json" -v "$INIT_CWD/.swagger-codegen-ignore:/etc/.swagger-codegen-ignore" -v "$INIT_CWD/temp:/tmp/codegen-out" swaggerapi/swagger-codegen-cli-v3:latest generate -c /etc/conf.json -i /etc/spec.json -l typescript-axios -o /tmp/codegen-out --ignore-file-override=/etc/.swagger-codegen-ignore
scripts.generate:move: shx cp -R temp/apis src && shx cp -R temp/models src && shx cp temp/*.ts src
scripts.generate:fix: shx echo "export * from './models';">>src/index.ts && shx echo "export * from './base';">>src/index.ts
